All around pretty solid game, free-to-play brought a lot of hackers but just report them and they get taken care of pretty quickly. Never takes too long to get into a game and the player base is (for the most part) fairly nice. Play it a few times a week, runs good, basically never crashes, so would recommend for occasional relaxed playing.
